channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anonymous money fuels $5 million in attacks on Georgiaâ€™s Lt. Gov. Burt Jones
WATCH: Indy Big Band Christmas Caroling musicians spread holiday cheer to those in need
item.description: In a quiet Indianapolis neighborhood, a special group of musicians stepped up to spread some much-needed Christmas spirit to families in need.

item.title: Russia targets Kyiv with deadly strikes ahead of Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
item.description: Explosions boomed across Kyiv for hours as ballistic missiles and drones hit the city in an attack that began early in the morning.

item.title: Winter weather hits Northeast as new storm system moves across country
item.description: The New York City area accumulated just above 4 inches of snow as difficult travel conditions are expected through Saturday while crews work to clean ...

item.title: WATCH: Major winter storm lashes Northeast
item.description: Heavy snow fell throughout the Northeast on Friday, as southern Connecticut through the Hudson Valley saw anywhere from 2 to 6 inches of snow.

item.title: Georgia inmates threatened to kill Lyft driver during escape, affidavit reveals
item.description: The three inmates who escaped the DeKalb County Jail threatened to kill and sexually assault their terrified Lyft driver while fleeing to Florida, cou...

item.title: Man charged with fatal shooting of woman during backyard target practice
item.description: The victim was sitting with her family under a covered porch several blocks away when she was hit by a bullet, according to a probable cause affidavit...

item.title: WATCH: Stranded turtles rescued and flown to warmer water
item.description: Various organizations teamed up to get the "cold-stunned" sea turtles out of frigid Cape Cod waters.

item.title: Winter storm snarls U.S. holiday travel across Northeast, Great Lakes
item.description: More than a thousand flights were canceled or delayed across the Northeast and Great Lakes as a winter storm disrupted one of the busiest travel weeke...

item.title: WATCH: Hero middle schoolers help save bus driver
item.description: Surveillance video from inside a school bus shows the moment heroic students in Ashland, Ohio, helped save a bus driver in medical distress.

item.title: Michigan hires former Utah coach Kyle Whittingham to lead the Wolverines
item.description: The university fired ex-coach Sherrone Moore on Dec. 10 for having an "inappropriate relationship" with a female staffer.

item.title: Sure, the newspaper informed. But as it fades, those who used it for other things must adjust, too
12/27: Saturday Morning
item.description: Major storms across the U.S. are threatening holiday travel. Meanwhile, President Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy are set to meet.
